name: Sonya Franklin
text: My daughter goes here they have been extremely nice and helpful

name: Octavia Webster
text: A great place! I have not yet achieved pregnancy but I have gone there for tests before. I wish they had programs for people actually wanting to get pregnant, but that aside I think what they do is great! They are Christian minded and have wonderful programs to help get ready for motherhood such as a shop that you can get baby needs from!! I am going tomorrow to drop off some donations!

name: Keshia Coleman
text: The business is great. Meet new people learn new thing accomplish things

name: Amanda Reyes
text: Their ad on Google says they provide free abortion services, but that is not true. For accurate and non-judgemental information about your options, call Planned Parenthood. The closest place to get an abortion is West Alabama Women's Center in Tuscaloosa.

resp.text: The North Jefferson Women's Center provides free, non-judgmental abortion information and ultrasounds.  Many clinics charge a patient a substantial amount for the same services that this clinic offers for free.  This person has never been a patient and is not familiar with this clinic.  Call the North Jefferson Women's Center for , non-judgmental option information.

name: Joy Whitehead
text: The staff is always VERY friendly and helpful. I have been going there since day one with my pregnancy. They programs/services they offer are very informative and helpful. Not only that, but they are always willing to pray with you about situations and just lend a listening ear or a shoulder to cry on if you need it.  I would VERY highly reccomend the North Jefferson Women's Center to anyone!

name: Jennifer Valle
text: They are so nices. Varying helpful

name: Emerald Flowers
text: I'm in the Mommy Money Program & it is so helpful they help me get all the basic things I'll need for my 1st baby from Diapers and Baby food to Clothes and Toys.

name: Crow Cousin
text: Their service is totally profession, and without a doubt some of the friendliest staff I have ever encountered.

name: Krystle Gallegos
text: I had a sneaking suspicion I was pregnant around the holidays in 2011. You know when something isn't quite right with your body. My husband and I had never talked about having children so I was literally scared to even bring it up to him. He had literally told me before we married he really didn't want children. I didn't know who to talk to when I looked up a clinic to visit near me NJWC was my closest hope. I finally told my husband and he went with me to my appointment. I was only two weeks away from the second trimester! It was very overwhelming but the staff was so supportive - their classes are very informative. I knew NOTHING about babies but I felt confident I could care for a child after completing their program. I can still go pick up supplies if I need anything and I have made some lasting relationships with the women who helped me through it all. They are a true blessing!

name: Ebony Richardson
text: Love the atmosphere of the place and wonderful workers! I would recommend anyone to visit!

name: Marie Johnson
text: the staff were truly a blessing to me when I felt as if I nowhere to turn. the work they do there  is wonderful.

name: Laqundra Rice
text: Love love love it here! Would recommend to everyone.

name: Amanda Isales
text: Love these women and classes they offer

name: Alabama Norml
text: They mean well. They could most certainly be more professional.

name: James Nelson
text: I do not know how North Jefferson Women's Clinic is I have not been there.

name: Dixie Godette
text: Helped me when I needed them.
